item.title: Memory Map
item.description: The following table shows a short overview of Bomb Jack memory map as seen and used by Z80.

item.title: Dip Switch Settings
item.description: Bomb Jack PCB has two dip switches to configure game settings. How the game accesses and makes use of them is explained right here.
